A

AdhocQueryProcessor - Class in <Unnamed>
 
AdhocQueryProcessor() - Constructor for class AdhocQueryProcessor
 

C

createMainMethod(FileWriter, int, boolean, String, String, String, int, String, String) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
Creates the main method for the generated code which initiates the query engine execution.
createMethodToEvaluateExpression(FileWriter) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method is used to evaluate a given relational expression Operators supported :- For string comparison --> "=","!=" For int comparison --> ">","<","<=",">=","==","<>"
createMethodToEvaluateGrpFunc(FileWriter) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This is a generic method to evaluate all aggregate functions Functions supported :-sum(), min(), max(), count() and average()
createMethodToGetDBConnection(FileWriter) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method returns the database connection
createMethodToGetSalesData(FileWriter, List<String>) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method is used to get all the data from sales table and store it in the List of Sales object in memory
createMethodToPopulateMFStructure(FileWriter) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method populates the MF structure from the list of sales record based on the where clause condition and grouping variables.
createMethodToProcessHavingClause(FileWriter) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method parses the having clause expression and filters the records from MF Structure based in this expression Format of having clause expression: {left condition}[boolean operator][right condition] Format of condition: {left operand,operator,right operand} Having clause example: {avg_quant_NY,>,avg_quant_CT} [&&] {avg_quant_NY,>,avg_quant_NJ}
createMethodToProcessPredicates(FileWriter) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method does the following: Step 1: Parses the predicate expression Step 2: Evaluate each tuple record for the given predicate expression against the list of MF structure records Format of the predicate clause expression:- Predicate clause for each grouping variables are separated by ",".
createMFStructure(Map<String, String>, String[], FileWriter) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method creates MF Structure object.
createSalesClass(FileWriter) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method creates the sales object to hold the sales table records.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
Main method.

P

processQueries(List<List<String>>) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method executes the queries.

Q

QUERY_SEPERATOR - Static variable in class AdhocQueryProcessor
 

R

readInputFile() - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method reads the input query file (containing multiple queries separated by "~") and returns the list of all the queries represented by list of strings.
retreiveDataTypes(List<String>) - Method in class AdhocQueryProcessor
This method retrieves the data types of the the grouping attributes from the information schema
